title: FPS cap is not working and would i get banned for third party software
body:
Hi, 

It seems I cant cap my  FPS in game. Which ever one i choose it is always above 60, which seems to make my laptop to bottleneck the internet connection; the more in-game models there are on my screen the bigger ping i have (when i use my phone for tethering - no problem ).

I have a Lenovo Z51 with a AMD Radeon R9 M375.

The second part about third party programs.
The "Radeon Settings" utility seems to have options that auto-detects games and allows me to change game settings, like FPS cap, V-sync anti-alias etc. 
That also doesn't seem to work, And then i noticed that the utility picked up the game client not the game itself. So if i go and manually add the game *.exe in the utility - will that trigger a banable offence as a use of third party programs?

replies.body: Our tech team may be able to provide some options for your specific issue.  Reach out to them by[ submitting a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)
